item.description: Designers Group is open to designers and members that are involved in the promotion and marketing of fashion. We will discuss techniques and experiences using social networks to sell and to network. How can you make your social network pages consistent with your brand image? How can you reach the demographic that is most likely to buy your fashion products? How can you use applications to sell your product? These are among some of the questions that we will discuss. There will also be time for networking. See you there!
item.name: Using Social Networks and Applications To Sell and To Network!
